articles.title: EXPLAINER: What is monkeypox and where is it spreading? - Greenwich Time
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — European and American health authorities have identified a number of...
articles.content: LONDON (AP) European and American health authorities have identified a number of monkeypox cases in recent days, mostly in young men. It's a surprising outbreak of a disease that rarely appears outsi… [+4214 chars]
